short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: While conducting UI review, it helps users easily capture & upload screenshots of a website within our Software, BuildUX UI Reviews

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool is a part of a SAAS tool, BuildUX UI Reviews. It helps in capturing screenshots of a any products or services websites for which the user is conducting a UI review and automatically paste the screenshots within our SAAS tool, BuildUX UI Reviews.
